Running command: cat > reproduce_issue.py << 'PY'
import os, sys
# Use local matplotlib package in this repo
sys.path.insert(0, os.path.abspath('lib'))
# Use non-GUI backend
os.environ.setdefault('MPLBACKEND', 'Agg')
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.widgets import SpanSelector

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot([10, 20], [10, 20])
ss = SpanSelector(ax, print, "horizontal", interactive=True)
print('xlim after creating span selector:', ax.get_xlim())
PY

python reproduce_issue.py

cat > reproduce_issue.py << 'PY'
import os, sys
# Use local matplotlib package in this repo
sys.path.insert(0, os.path.abspath('lib'))
# Use non-GUI backend
os.environ.setdefault('MPLBACKEND', 'Agg')
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.widgets import SpanSelector

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot([10, 20], [10, 20])
ss = SpanSelector(ax, print, "horizontal", interactive=True)
print('xlim after creating span selector:', ax.get_xlim())
